items.title: HP UFT Online Training, HP QTP Online Course, free videos
items.headline: Foundation course for beginners to start working on automation testing tool HP UFT Unified functional testing
objectives_summary: At the end of the course my students are able to handle common concepts of HP UFT with some VB Script

items.title: Software Testing and Quality Assurance Fundamentals
items.headline: QA software testing course that will help you get a manual software testing job. Covers testing types, test plans etc.
objectives_summary: Will get a general idea about the profession
Will know what a day in the life of a software tester looks like
Will get familiarised with some necessary vocabulary

items.title: Robot Framework Test Automation - Saucelabs Integration

visible_instructors.name: Bryan
visible_instructors.title: Bryan Lamb
visible_instructors.job_title: My courses will improve your life and income!

items.headline: Run Robot Framework tests in the cloud on different OS, browser, or mobile device combinations!
objectives_summary: Convert your existing Robot Framework scripts to run on OS/browser combinations in the cloud
Save lots of time & frustration when you no longer have to build & maintain your own test automation target computers
Leverage Saucelabs' built-in screen recording feature to review any test after the fact

items.title: Software Testing Fundamentals + Common Interview Q&A.
items.headline: This course is designed to give you the skills required to start career in Software Testing
objectives_summary: Know everything about Software Testing to pass entry interviews.
Improve and structure the Software Testing skills for the new job opportunities.
Understand Software Testing techniques and concepts.

items.title: Learn Automation with Geb and Spock
items.headline: Another wrapper on Selenium WebDriver to resolve your Automation need, So learn Geb and Spock to automate
objectives_summary: Learn Geb from scratch
Learn page object modelling and its implementation
Understand the meaningful use of Spock Testing Framework

items.title: Looking to Learn BDD - Cucumber....? Get expertise in 2 hrs
items.headline: Step by Step BDD Concepts | Cucumber Framework | Gherkin Language |End to End Integration Selenium Cucumber Maven Java
objectives_summary: ** Would have good understand of BDD concepts & ready to implement in your project ***
** Good understanding of Gherkin, its Keywords & best practices ***
** Tester will be ready to work in different automation tools with BDD approach ***

Gain confidence in Coding for Automation Testing Projects - be Productive at Work from Day-1
Learn Java (and massive *** bonus Cucumber ***) from an OOP & Automation Testing Projects view point

items.title: Automation Testing with QTP
items.headline: Become an expert automation tester through this award winning HP Quick Test Professional (QTP) course.
objectives_summary: Create an automated framework quickly and easily for all of your automation needs
Use an excel sheet for importing and reading data for your automated script
Create a reusable function library that makes creating new testing scenarios a breeze!

items.title: Angular Fundamentals from Scratch & Unit/Integration Testing

Get the deep understanding of the Angular fundamentals to quickly establish yourself as a frontend developer
You will learn Angular Unit Testing and Integration Testing Best Practices
